name: Skribbl.io
storyline: When its your turn to draw, you will have to choose a word from three options and then draw a picture of that word within the time limit (default: 80 seconds). When another player is drawing, you have to type your guess into the chat. Earn points by answering the correct word. Be quick: the earlier you guess a word, the more points you get!
summary: Skribbl.io is a free multiplayer drawing and guessing game. One game consists of a few rounds in which every round someone has to draw their chosen word and others have to guess it to gain points! The person with the most points at the end of game will then be crowned as the winner!
